title: Marco Bizzarri on China’s Role in Gucci’s $10 Billion Plan | Inside Fashion
itunes:title: Marco Bizzarri on China’s Role in Gucci’s $10 Billion Plan | Inside Fashion
itunes:subtitle: Marco Bizzarri sits down with Imran Amed at the BoF China Summit to uncover how much of Gucci's success hinges on the Chinese consumer and how he plans to leverage the market to achieve his lofty revenue target.To sign up to the Daily Digest newsletter
description:
Marco Bizzarri sits down with Imran Amed at the BoF China Summit to uncover how much of Gucci's success hinges on the Chinese consumer and how he plans to leverage the market to achieve his lofty revenue target.

To sign up to the Daily Digest newsletter click the link here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews
